title: How to Run a Home Poker Tournament

steps.title: The most realistic affordable size is 500 chip 11.5 gram (0.4 oz) weight set.
steps.content: The most realistic affordable size is 500 chip 11.5 gram (0.4 oz) weight set. A 1000 chip set will easily allow you to host a 2 table 20 player tournament. You will need a minimum of 8 players and a maximum of 20 depending on your poker chip set. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Then, every 15 minutes, raise them.
steps.content: Then, every 15 minutes, raise them. This way the tournament doesn't run all night. [2] X Research source If your chip set has more than 3 colours, assign the extras to large chip amounts like 500 and 1000. This way you can colour up and remove the smaller chips. [3] X Research source

steps.title: You don't want to discourage people from joining.
steps.content: You don't want to discourage people from joining. A $5 entry is reasonable to most who play poker.

steps.title: Prize pool payouts should be as follows; 50% to the winner, 30% to second place and 20% to third place.
steps.content: Prize pool payouts should be as follows; 50% to the winner, 30% to second place and 20% to third place. If you are having a 2 table tournament (20 players) you could make the top 4 players winners. [4] X Research source
